content_description:
From our founding until now, our mission has remained the same: to remove the engineering burden from data teams by standardizing and fully automating data connectors. With Fivetran, your data just arrives in your warehouse, canonical and ready to query, no engineering or maintenance required. As we watch more and more companies leverage our technology to become truly data-driven, we’re proud not only of our growth but also of the fact that we’ve grown without compromising our core values.

Integrity.
We do the right thing, even when it's harder in the short run. We challenge the status quo by reasoning from first principles.

Initiative.
Fivetran belongs to all of us. We take ownership and are accountable for getting things done. Through curiosity, learning, and coaching, we grow as individuals and teams.

One team, one dream.
We share the pains and successes of our customers, partners and colleagues. We seek, gather, and trust a diverse group of teammates with different perspectives to guide Fivetran's progress.

If these values resonate with you, we’d love to hear from you.

The Fivetran security team is responsible for ensuring the continuous integrity, confidentiality, and availability of customers’ data. Our customers necessarily trust us with all their most sensitive information, and we consider maintaining that trust to be a critical, core component of our product and business.  
Security Engineers are responsible for the architecture and development of frameworks, systems, and solutions to address current and future threats to the Fivetran product. These security concerns are ever-evolving, making the security team an extremely dynamic environment to work in.

Fivetran is one of the fastest growing tech companies in the world, and our EMEA expansion is an essential part of our global strategy. Fivetran is looking for a highly skilled and driven individual to be a key support to our EMEA General Manager and Leadership Team throughout our growth. The operations manager will assist our leadership in a diverse range of activities to assist with our ongoing success.

content_description:
From our founding until now, our mission has remained the same: to remove the engineering burden from data teams by standardizing and fully automating data connectors. With Fivetran, your data just arrives in your warehouse, canonical and ready to query, no engineering or maintenance required. As we watch more and more companies leverage our technology to become truly data-driven, we’re proud not only of our growth but also of the fact that we’ve grown without compromising our core values.

Integrity.
We do the right thing, even when it's harder in the short run. We challenge the status quo by reasoning from first principles.

Initiative.
Fivetran belongs to all of us. We take ownership and are accountable for getting things done. Through curiosity, learning, and coaching, we grow as individuals and teams.

One team, one dream.
We share the pains and successes of our customers, partners and colleagues. We seek, gather, and trust a diverse group of teammates with different perspectives to guide Fivetran's progress.

If these values resonate with you, we’d love to hear from you.

Our marketing team is looking for an Email Marketer & Growth hacker to significantly improve marketing funnel metrics by developing and maintaining email nurture programs and by A/B testing digital experiences to improve lead conversion and quality.

As an Email Marketer & Growth Hacker you will:
Lead audience segmentation and reporting, for both customers and prospects, to determine email marketing campaigns and inform audience goals for the content team
Develop and maintain both email content and automation for email marketing programs including product updates, affiliate newsletters, blog newsletter, event and webinar invites, trial & demo emails, new customer emails, and more
Determine lead scoring criteria, collaborating with operations team to implement notification system for the sales team
Collaborate with sales, product, and content marketing teams to maintain unity of voice and technical accuracy of email messaging
Identify opportunities to improve lead conversions on Fivetran digital properties. Collaborate with design, content marketing, and front event developers to experiment through A/B testing
Measure and share success metrics by creating email marketing dashboards in Looker, collaborating with analytics team

You are:
Able to conceptualize and communicate systems thinking and workflows
Curious, creative and opportunistic. Able to identify and strategize improvements
Attentive to detail. You have a thoughtfully crafted writing style that will represent the voice of Fivetran
Calm under pressure and the able to juggle multiple projects at once

Ideally you have:
Expert level email marketing, automation, and segmentation experience (Pardot, Marketo, Salesforce, ect.)
Basic/Intermediate design skills (photoshop, Sketch, ect.)
Intermediate copywriting abilities
Startup experience or ability to own a channel autonomously
Nice to have: experience with A/B testing tools such as Optimizely
Nice to have: working knowledge of HTML/CSS 

Perks of working with us:
100% paid Medical, Dental, Vision and Basic Life Insurance
Unlimited/flexible PTO
401k match program
Pet Insurance -- and yes, you can bring your well-behaved fur babies to work
Commuter Benefits to help with transit and parking costs
Professional development and training opportunities
Unlimited coffee, office snacks and frequent catered lunches
Company happy hours and fun team building activities


ABOUT US:
Fivetran is part of an analytics data stack and the growing ecosystem of cloud based infrastructure companies.

After a five-minute setup, the software replicates data from applications, databases, events and files into a cloud data warehouse. 

The company began with a realization: for modern companies using cloud-based software and storage, traditional ETL tools badly underperformed, and the complicated configurations they required often led to project failures. To streamline and accelerate business intelligence projects, Fivetran developed automated connectors that come with ready-to-query schemas and effortlessly deliver data into modern, high-performant warehouses.
